SEARCH
Module main.Robotix
Package Controller

Class HomepageController

java.lang.Object
Controller.HomepageController
public class HomepageController extends Object
This controller manage user actions in Homepage Menu. It allows the user to navigate to different pages in the application.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    HomepageController()
    The controller for the Homepage view in the application.

    displayCorrectMenu()
     
    void
    displayRobotixActivities()
    Displays all available activities client has not joined.The client can join an activity by clicking the "Join" button, which will add the activity to their list and update the JSON file.

    Loads the Inbox FXML file and goes to the user's email inbox page.
